title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: Analyzing Excellence Indicators in Instructional Design and Technology (IDT) Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Identify three or more indicators of excellence for IDT programs through surveys and thematic analysis
Compare learner and instructor perceptions to propose two or more program improvement directions
Develop one or more instructional design strategies applicable to your work area based on analysis results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
